abort.no_serial: [NT] This device does not provide serial number. Discovery aborted

device_internet_access.name: Device internet access control
device_internet_access.description: Change device internet access using parental control feature of the router. Please, refer to the documentation for the additional possible parameters

entities.name: Entities
entities.description: Select device(s) to change internet access settings

state.name: State
state.description: Set the state for the device(s)

remove_trackers.name: Remove device trackers
remove_trackers.description: Remove device trackers from the device registry. Please, keep in mind, when run, the service will remove selected trackers from watching and will allow you to remove the entities manually.

entities.name: Entities
entities.description: Select device(s) to remove from the device registry
